full_output.summary: Dynamic and results-driven Computer Science and Engineering Undergraduate with a passion for leveraging cutting-edge technologies to drive innovation and solve complex problems. Proficient in software development, cloud engineering, system analysis, and project management, adept at collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to deliver high-quality solutions. Possess a solid foundation in algorithms, data structures, and programming languages.

projects.name: Gail Order Tracker Using Tableau
projects.description: Facilitated on the project under the guidance of certified and seasoned mentors. Played a pivotal role in implementing data-driven solutions to address critical business challenges, leveraging tools such as Tableau to visualize and communicate key findings to stakeholders.

projects.name: Pneumonia Detection & X-Ray Image Warehouse
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using CNN and TensorFlow for pneumonia detection and established an X-ray image warehouse for efficient data management and retrieval.

projects.name: Pizza Delivery Website
projects.description: Designed and implemented a user-friendly pizza delivery website leveraging HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.name: Student Details Management System
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive student details management system using database management system (DBMS) principles. Implemented features for storing, retrieving, and updating student information efficiently, facilitating streamlined administrative processes.

projects.name: React Static Site Deployment using AWS Services
projects.description: Deployed a static React application by leveraging Amazon S3 for storage and Amazon Route 53 for domain management and routing.

projects.name: Arcade System
projects.description: Constructed an arcade system employing the principles of OOPs for modular design and efficient code organization. Designed various game modules with distinct functionalities to create an interactive gaming experience.

experiences.description: Gained extensive hands-on experience with AWS services, including EC2, S3, IAM, and serverless computing solutions such as AWS Lambda and ECS. Configured and managed private DNS servers and implemented security measures including Zero Trust Architecture. Conducted research and created presentations on advanced cloud computing concepts such as private and sovereign cloud, cybersecurity mesh architecture (CSMA), security design in private cloud, and Security Operation Center (SOC). Developed practical skills in auto-scaling, Elastic Load Balancing (ELB), and deploying various AWS resources using tools like AWS CloudFormation, Elastic Beanstalk, and AWS CodePipeline. Monitored all installed systems for the highest level of availability, creating a Microservices Architecture for production environments and a Highly Available Website architecture. Monitored and tested application performance to identify potential bottlenecks, developed solutions, and collaborated with developers on solution implementation. Redirected traffic from EC2 using ELB, implemented API gateways, and hosted static websites through Amazon S3. Spearheaded the development of advanced analytical models utilizing cutting-edge data analysis techniques to extract actionable insights.

full_output.name: Prabhjot Singh
achievements_and_awards: Appointed as the Student Placement Coordinator (SPC) for the esteemed batch of 2025, a position reserved for the top 5% of students, showcasing exceptional capabilities in networking, coordination, and professionalism.

Recognized with the Deans List Certificate for achieving a remarkable 9.73 GPA in the 5th semester, placing within the top 10% of students and highlighting academic excellence and dedication to learning.

Engaged as a member of prestigious professional organizations including IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers) and ACM (Association for Computing Machinery), fostering knowledge exchange, networking, and professional development.
